European shares flat as losses in healthcare outweigh minersEuropean equities opened flat on Tuesday after losses in healthcare stocks partially offset a jump in miners, while focus remained on the European Central Bank's policy meeting due later this week for signals on the interest rate trajectory. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 08:40:23 GMT MZ5UEDOO2BPBHHIRLMTXHGERQA https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/european-shares-flat-losses-healthcare-outweigh-miners-2024-01-23/Reuters市场欧洲市场
China hopes UN review of human rights is constructive, non-politicisedThe Chinese foreign ministry said on Tuesday that it hoped all parties at the United Nations reviewing China's human rights record would be "constructive" and "non-politicised". Tue, 23 Jan 2024 07:58:28 GMT W2L44UIWTVMRVMVEGZTKB6PSGI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-hopes-un-review- human-rights-constructive-non-politicized-2024-01-23/Reuters世界中国
Measures China has taken to prop up its stock marketChinese shares rebounded on Tuesday on a Bloomberg News report that said Chinese authorities are considering several measures to bolster the stock market. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 07:15:29 GMT HQ4SZDYGWVKBFBGT4JOJMVX3CA https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/measures-china-has-taken-prop-up-its-stock-market-2024-01-23/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
What investors are saying about China's market meltdownStock markets in China and Hong Kong have slumped to multi-year lows this week as confidence in the world's second-biggest economy has evaporated and foreign money has fled, while data showed sputtering growth and deepening real estate malaise. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 05:49:26 GMT ZMXIBWBQTFNRRLLDTU6F7E4TPKA https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/what-investors-are-saying-about-chinas-market-meltdown-2024-01-23/Reuters市场亚洲市场
German president, businesses visit Vietnam eyeing labour deal, investmentA German business delegation, including top firms for tunnel machines, wind farms and industrial supplies, is joining President Frank-Walter Steinmeier in a visit to Vietnam starting on Tuesday, as Berlin pushes its China de-risking strategy. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 05:36:34 GMT UVGM2BSVX5NN5KD7NGJQEVALKU https://www.reuters.com/business/german-president-businesses-visit-vietnam-eyeing-labour-deal-investment-2024-01-23/Francesco Guarascio, Phuong Nguyen商业
Singapore's Asia Genesis closes hedge fund after losing bets on China, JapanSingapore-based Asia Genesis Asset Management is liquidating its hedge fund after a "significant and unprecedented drawdown" following missteps in Chinese and Japanese bets. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 05:34:19 GMT NGO5MTTEIRJILOWJAECYHXTOCI https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/singapores-asia-genesis-closes-hedge-fund-after-losing-bets-china-japan-2024-01-23/Summer Zhen市场亚洲市场
